abstract: General Electric has signed a deal to sell an 81 percent stake in G.E. Security’s Homeland Protection business to France’s Safran for $580 million.
lead_paragraph: General Electric has signed a deal to sell an 81 percent stake in G.E. Security’s Homeland Protection business to France’s Safran for $580 million.

headline.main: G.E. Sells Stake in Homeland Protection Unit for $580 Million
